p.k: Jazz Open: Swing It ! 1999. Big Kahuna and the Copa Cat Pack, Lionel Hampton, Indigo Swing & Rosemary Clooney. Kulturzentrum Liederhalle, Stuttgart, Stuttgart, Germany
p.d: What started out as a club phenomenon is now garnering critical attention and infiltrating the pop charts. The music that ruled for three decades has had a resurgence with a modern movement dubbed Neo Swing. Swing It is a performance special showcasing the Swing phenomenon sweeping the continent. It will feature the best of the neo big bands and famous guest vocalists set against the dance club scene that has made the movement soar.
